snippet: More than 40 years after Louis Armstrong’s death, it’s possible to spend a virtual day with him in New York, including a visit to Armstrong’s longtime home in Queens, now a museum.
abstract: John Marchese spends virtual day with jazz great Louis Armstrong in New York City, visiting his old haunts and longtime home in Queens, now turned into Louis Armstrong House Museum.
lead_paragraph: More than 40 years after Louis Armstrong’s death, it’s possible to spend a virtual day with him in New York, including a visit to Armstrong’s longtime home in Queens, now a museum.

headline.seo: Ways to Spend a Virtual Day With Louis Armstrong
headline.main: Back Where He Belonged: An All-Satchmo Day
headline.print_headline: Back Where He Belonged: An All-Satchmo Day

keywords.value: Queens College, City University of New York
keywords.name: organizations
